arts.ttl: Maresca provides Palmer injury update after Chelsea thrash West Ham
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca provides an injury update on Cole Palmer after the playmaker was forced to withdraw from the Blues XI against West Ham United.

arts.ttl: Graham Potter makes honest admission about his West Ham future as captain Jarrod Bowen FUMES after 5-1 thrashing by Chelsea
arts.sum: JAMES SHARPE AT LONDON STADIUM: The Hammers were dispatched 5-1 by a rampant Chelsea side at the London Stadium that did not even need the services of Cole Palmer.

arts.ttl: Chelsea win at West Ham proves we‚Äôre not reliant on Cole Palmer ‚Äì Enzo Maresca
arts.sum: The 23-year-old withdrew from the starting line-up minutes before kick-off after feeling discomfort in his groin during the warm-up.

arts.ttl: West Ham 1-5 Chelsea: Five-star Blues thrash hapless Hammers to secure first win of the season
arts.sum: The Blues started the second half how they ended the first and scored with another corner when a poor clearance from goalkeeper Mads Hermansen resulted in Moises Caicedo latching onto the loose ball and poking home. With six minutes on the clock, West Ham made the perfect start when the Blues failed to close down Lucas Paqueta, who had plenty of space on the edge of the area, before rifling a delightful left footed strike into the top right corner.

arts.ttl: West Ham United 1-5 Chelsea: Chelsea Post Match Player Ratings
arts.sum: Wingers Pedro Neto and Estevao also made light work of the space in behind, with Neto scoring at the far post and Estevao producing a brilliant run and assist for Enzo Fernandez. Chelsea are up and running in the Premier League - going top as things stand after a 5-1 demolition of London rivals West Ham.

arts.ttl: Chelsea ratings: South American trident with 8/10 in rout at West Ham
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca's side get their first win of the season in style, cruising to a 5-1 victory away at West Ham United with several standout performances.

arts.ttl: Chelsea hands out heavy beating to West Ham in Premier League without injured Palmer
arts.sum: Palmer pulled out of the team at the last minute after getting hurt in the warmup, before Chelsea went a goal down in the sixth minute at the Olympic Stadium after a long-range piledriver from Lucas Paqueta. After Caicedo poked in the fourth goal in the 54th minute after West Ham goalkeeper Mads Hermansen flapped at an in-swinging corner, some home fans left the stadium.

arts.ttl: Opinion: Sit down Joao Pedro, 'quality' 86-touch Chelsea star dominated vs West Ham
arts.sum: FORGET Joao Pedro üò≥ another Chelsea ‚≠êÔ∏è DOMINATED üí™ vs West Ham United!

arts.ttl: Why did Cole Palmer not feature in Premier League London derby against West Ham?
arts.sum: Chelsea‚Äôs talisman was named in the starting XI but was replaced with minutes to go by Estevao Willian

arts.ttl: West Ham 1-5 Chelsea: Blues THRASH hapless London rivals as five different players find the net to heap pressure on Graham Potter
arts.sum: JAMES SHARPE AT LONDON STADIUM: The world champions are top of the league and they didn't even need Cole Palmer to take them there.
